default.headline: Work at the Speed of Thought
default.subheadline: Your computer already sees your patterns. Now it acts on them. No more explaining what you're doing—your work explains itself.
default.body: WorkspaceOS is the intelligence layer across all your tools. Through Hybrid IntelligenceCombining Screen-Level Vision with deep API integration for 100% truth. (works with anything you can see + APIs), it connects patterns between your disconnected apps. Once it learns your workflow through Pattern-First ComputingFirst time: learns the pattern. Forever after: executes directly. Your repeated workflows become permanent, cost-free automations., it handles the coordination permanently—status updates write themselves, context follows you between tools, repetitive tasks disappear. Unlike passive AI tools, WorkspaceOS uses an internal Agent ParliamentA 'Red Team' AI challenges every plan for security and logic flaws before the 'Executor' AI acts, ensuring safety. to verify every autonomous action, ensuring safety before execution. Your focus stays unbroken while the 58% of your day spent on 'work about work' gets handled automatically. Stay in deep focus. Your safe, self-governing AI partner handles everything else.

dev.headline: Your AI-powered Engineering Co-pilot
dev.subheadline: WorkspaceOS eliminates 40% of status meetings through Self-Governing Autonomy.
dev.body: WorkspaceOS watches your engineering workflow and eliminates the coordination tax. By combining Screen-Level VisionLike having an AI that sees your entire screen. Works with legacy enterprise software, brand new SaaS tools, even websites without APIs. with deep API & Git Integration, it builds a Hybrid Causal GraphConnects what it sees (Screen) with what it knows (Git/API) to build a graph of 100% truth. of your engineering reality. Your PR gets merged? Jira updates itself—verified by Git. Debug session discovers root cause? Documentation writes itself. Unlike standard copilots, WorkspaceOS uses an internal Agent ParliamentA 'Red Team' AI challenges every plan for security and logic flaws before the 'Executor' AI acts, ensuring safety. to debate and verify every autonomous action before execution. Every pattern you repeat becomes a permanent automation, cached locally for instant execution through Pattern-First ComputingFirst time: learns the pattern. Forever after: executes directly. Your repeated workflows become permanent, cost-free automations..

ai.headline: One OS for All Your AI
ai.subheadline: WorkspaceOS connects your AI agents into a unified intelligence layer that shares context across every tool.
ai.body: Your AI tools are islands—Claude doesn't know what Copilot wrote, ChatGPT can't see your Cursor sessions, and none of them remember yesterday's work. WorkspaceOS creates persistent memory across all AI interactions. When you debug with Copilot, your ChatGPT sessions know the context. When Claude writes documentation, it sees what you built in Cursor. Through screen-level pattern recognition, every AI agent shares the same understanding of your project. One conversation continues across all tools, with patterns cached permanently for zero-cost replay.

vision.headline: Computing That Learns Your Patterns
vision.subheadline: WorkspaceOS transforms repeated workflows into permanent computational primitives that execute at zero cost.
vision.body: Every workflow you repeat becomes a first-class object in WorkspaceOS. Like files and processes in traditional computing, your patterns become permanent, shareable, and composable. The first time you handle a payment error by checking logs, updating the dashboard, and notifying ops—that pattern is captured forever. Next time, it executes instantly at zero marginal cost. Through universal screen-level awareness, these patterns work across any application, any version, any platform. Your workflows become the new assembly language of knowledge work.
